sign-in.title: Enter Phone Number
sign-in.about: Please enter a phone number used for sign up. You will receive an SMS with a 4 digit confirmation code
sign-in.never-pass: We will never pass your number to anyone.

confirm.title: Confirmation Code
confirm.about: Enter the code we just sent you to the finish sign in process
confirm.resend-active-text: One more confirmation code has been sent

sign-up.title: Sign Up
sign-up.search-empty:
It only takes a few seconds - find your business,
 review details, and you're ready to go!
sign-up.location-placeholder: Find business by name or address

beacons.title: My Beacons
beacons.create-first: Create your first Beacon for customers to discover!

new-beacon.location-placeholder: Search location by name, address or phone number

published.instant-unlock-about: Customers can use internal currency to unlock Beacon Rewards. The funds are shared after the Beacon is unlocked.
published.tasks-about: Tasks are activities for customers to perform to earn Beacon Rewards.
published.reward-about: Create or assign unique rewards for customers to earn. Customers can earn discounts, free items or even unique one of a kind experiences.
published.partners-about: Partners can verify tasks and beacons. They will have full access to the statistics of this Beacon and can communicate with customers.

type.title: BEACON TYPE
type.information-about: Information Beacons help customers find great spots around your destination and information about them. They work great for users making plans, or exploring specialized filters.
type.interactive-about: Interactive Beacons are designed for customers looking to experience your destination on a deeper level. Customers can earn rewards that range from free items, discounts, or one of a kind experiences.

tasks-modal.title: Tasks
tasks-modal.free-about: Free form tasks are creative tasks to encourage customers to perform specific actions e.g. ask for a specific person or buy a specific item
tasks-modal.sequential-about: Sequential tasks are loyalty based tasks to encourage repeat customers over multiple visits e.g. Visit multiple times or buy an item over multiple days
tasks-modal.warn: User can complete the tasks in any order to earn a reward

unpublished.number-coupons-about: Users can earn an unlimited number of coupons until beacon expires or is deleted
unpublished.number-coupons-about-limit: Users can earn up to coupons, beacon will be closed once the last coupon is earned
unpublished.expiration-about-days: Beacon will automatically expire X# days after it is published

un-publish-modal.title: Unpublish Beacon
un-publish-modal.about: By unpublishing beacon users will no longer will be able to interactive with beacon, accept tasks, write reviews and add it to plans.

unpublished.title: Unpublish beacon
unpublished.about: Beacon will be removed from public, but remain in beacons list

filters.title: My Filters
filters.create-first: Filters are a powerful way to show customers different events, specials and parts of your destination. Create a group of Beacons for your customers to discover today!

delete-modal.title: Delete Filter?
delete-modal.about: All information about filter (title, description, image) will be deleted and filter will be removed from Filters section

un-publish-modal.title: Unpublish Filter?
un-publish-modal.about: Filter will be removed from Consumer app, but will remain in Filters section.

filter-verification-modal.title: Filter Verification
filter-verification-modal.about:
Please contact Tim to verify and publish filter in 
 your city.

profile.plugins-about: Plugins enable 3rd party services on your public profile. For example, an Uber button allows a user to request a ride around your destination with one tap
profile.hotels-about: By tapping on Hotels.com button, a screen with available booking options appears.
profile.photos-about: Photos are imported from your public social media profiles. You can hide any of these photos and upload your own
profile.admins-about: Admins will have full access to the business account and can manage beacons, partners, business information, and admins list.

new-admin-modal.title: New Admin
new-admin-modal.about: Admins will have full access to your account and will be able to manage the following information
new-admin-modal.access-first: Manage this account including admins and partners
new-admin-modal.access-second: Create new beacons and communicate with customers
new-admin-modal.access-third: Manage public information about the business and manage integrations
new-admin-modal.sent-about: Admin will receive an SMS with invitation and will be able to login to your account using following phone number

profile.partners-about: Partners will be able to verify tasks and beacons, have access to statistics of this beacon, and communicate with customers

new-partner-modal.title: New Partner
new-partner-modal.about: To simplify sign up process for your partner, please find your partner’s company using its name, phone number or address
new-partner-modal.invite-about: Partners won’t have access to your account settings and public information, but will be able to manage the following information

profile.coupons-about: Coupons are rewards that customers can earn and can range from free items, discounts, or one of a kind experiences.

uber-about: System will automatically build route using the Uber app

expiration-date.x-days: Beacon will expire X days after the start
expiration-date.info-state-1: Beacon will be active until it is manually stopped

validation.valid-invite-admin: This phone number is already registered in Beacon Me.

empty-notification-text: You currently don't have any notifications! Check back here for Beacon info, user activity, and more!
